summary: A Washington taxpayer objects to the assessment by the Department of use tax on transportation charges associated with the transport and delivery of materials the taxpayer used in a government contracting project completed in Washington. . . . The taxpayer contends that the Department improperly included transportation costs in the measure of use tax. Taxpayer’s petition is denied . . . . [T]ransport charges are included in the measure of use tax in addition to the value of the goods or materials purchased.
